title: Costa Says Congress Must Act Swiftly to Pass Water Legislation (Jim Costa)
text: ( Source : Jim Costa ) Washington, DC - Today , Rep. Jim Costa ( CA-16 ) released the following statement after the U.S. Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources legislative hearing on Western water bills including H.R. 2898 , the Western
